text: Božo Bakota (5 October 1950 - 1 October 2015) was a Croatian footballer. He played as a forward and midfielder professionally between 1971 and 1986. He played for NK Zagreb and SK Sturm Graz. He also played for the Yugoslavia national team in 1978. He was born in Zagreb. Bakota died on 1 October 2015 in Graz, Austria. He was 64. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Croatian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Zagreb Category:Yugoslavian footballers Category:Austrian Football Bundesliga top scorers
title: Božo Bakota
